['DescriptionEspace Real Estate is pleased to offer a beautiful Bungalow in the Green Community West. This villa offers the new owner a rare opportunity to own a 6 bedroom Bungalow. The villa has been extended out to the side where the maids quarters are located, increasing the built up area from its original 4,324 sqft to over 5,000 sqft. Within this extra living area the bedrooms have been increased from its standard 4 bedroom to a spacious 6 bedroom villa. All renovations and extensions have approvals from the developer. The property is located in a quiet Cul De Sac and sits on a generous 10,500 sq.ft plot and is a 2 minute walk to the community swimming pool.

Allsopp and Allsopp are delighted to welcome this two bed townhouse to the secondary market in Alandalus, Jumeirah Golf Estates.
This mid unit townhouse is on the central plaza area and is a superb option for end users or investors.

title_advert: ['5 Bed | Golf Course View | Private Pool']
descriptions:
['Description***VIDEO WALKTHROUGH BELOW***
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YFzs9eaHxb0
PH Real Estate are delighted to offer this absolutely stunning Type 5 villa in Arabian Ranches, Saheel 1.
This property offers stunning golf course views and is situated in an quiet and convenient location within Saheel 1 providing easy access to motorway and all local amenities.
- Type 5
- 5 Bedroom Plus Maid
- Two Reception Areas
- Stunning Pool Area
- Large Balconies
- Study
- largest Type In Saheel
This fabulous property birefly comprises of entrance hall, two receptions, dining room, kitchen, utility/storage rooms, five bedrooms, six bathrooms and a beautiful, immaculately kept pool to the rear of the property.
The Saheel community has its own unique atmosphere. Every effort has been made to create an environment where residents’ can enjoy a unique and satisfying outdoor lifestyle. It is the only community within the Ranches that has parks with walkways connecting from street to street where dog walking is encouraged.. There are green areas with seating to enjoy a BBQ, picnic or simply just sit to soak up the sights and sounds of local flora and fauna.
The Type 5 is the largest of floorplans offering a study that the other 5 beds do not feature.
This property benefits from very spacious rooms and draws plenty of light into the property making this a sensational family home.
To arrange a viewing please call James on +971556118905, wattsapp +971556118905 or email james.n@phrealestate.ae']

descriptions: ['DescriptionLocated near the intersection of Al Ain Road, between Emirates Road and Academic City Road, Villanova is a serene community that offers spacious 3, 4, 5 and 5+ bedroom villas and townhouses inspired by modern Mediterranean architecture.\nEach neighborhood at Villanova will house a designated park, kids play area, mosque, sports court, running track, cycling track, swimming pool and lush greenery in wide open spaces. The community is gracefully strung together by lush green Linear Parks dedicated for pedestrians. Each park has its own footpaths, cycling tracks, picnic spots, kids playgrounds, fitness stations and a lot more.\nAmaranta is located within the Villanova community. It will have over 18,000 sq. m. of lush green landscapes and beautiful gardens and is a perfect for families to grow together in their own home. Families will even be able to walk directly out onto the linear green-grassed park, which will become the heart of the community and a great place to host family gatherings.']

title_advert: ['Type A close to pool and park with keen seller']
amenities: ['Unfurnished\nBalcony\nMaids Room']
descriptions:
['DescriptionPH Real Estate are very pleased to offer this type A villa in Mira Oasis 1 which is in an excellent location within a short walk to the pool and park.
This brand new villa has the balance of the warranty on the property and has been handed over.
On the ground floor, the accomodation comprises an entrance hall, good sized living room with window and door to the garden, spacious closed kitchen with a range of fitted cupboards.   A powder room, laundry room and maid’s room complete the downstairs accomodation.
On the first floor, there is a very useful storage cupboard accessed from the landing area.  The master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom and range of fitted cupboards.  Two further bedrooms share a shower room accessed from the landing.
Outside, the rear garden has plenty of space for a family to enjoy outdoor space.
To the front of the property there is off road parking for two cars.
The owner of the property is motivated to sell the property so call now for a viewing.
Please call Martin +971567898722 or email martin@phrealestate.ae']

title_advert: ['Lovely 4BR Cayan Tower Panoramic marina  Sea view']
descriptions: ['DescriptionLovely upgraded 4 bedroom apartment at Cayan Tower on a high floor with panoramic marina view ... The apartment is well maintained and it is rented till September 2019. Cayan Tower, the 75-storey residential tower that spirals in a smooth curve by an astonishing 90 degrees to give every apartment a stunningview of the sea or marina. Cayan Tower´s dynamic twisting shape challenges conventional architecture and redefines standards of luxury.Cayan Tower is situated in a key location at the mouth of Dubai Marina thus enjoying great views on to the marina, sea and The Palm.Cayan Tower is a truly architectural vision, certain to take its place as an icon not only in Dubai but in the world through winning the international property award more than once. Designed by world-renowned Skidmore Owings and Merrill, otherwise known for projects such as Burj Khalifa, Trump Tower in Chicago, Jin Mao in Shanghai among many others.']

descriptions:
["DescriptionLuxuryProperty.com are delighted to present this spacious three-bedroom villa at Club Villas, Dubai Hills Estate.
• Open-Plan Layout
• Rooftop Terrace
• Swimming Pool
• Children's Play Area
• BUA: 2,936 sqft.
• Plot: 2,893 sqft.
• 40% Paid
• Completion: October 2020
This home features an expansive open-plan layout that impeccably unites the open kitchen and dining area with the large living room and opens out to two separate terraces both providing additional space for entertaining and outdoor seating.
A spacious bedroom is located on the ground floor, along with generous double-parking space. Two-bedrooms are located on the first floor with the master suite that includes a walk-in wardrobe, a sizeable en-suite bathroom, and access to a private balcony enjoying spectacular views of the golf course. Another key feature of this incredible home is the sprawling rooftop terrace which provides a perfect setting for outdoor entertainment.
For our most discerning clients, this would be a marvelous primary or secondary home."]
